newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Washington, N.J.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Washington, N.J.

text.p: SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the Township
Committee of the Township of Washington, in the County of Morris, New Jersey, at the Municipal Building, 43 Schooley's Mtn. Road, Long Valley, New Jersey on
until 11:00 o'clock A.M. at which time they will be publicly opened and announced, for the purchase of the following issue or issues of Bonds of said Township due on October 1 as follows:
$7,145,000 General Bonds of 1996, maturing in the
2007, $595,000 in 2008, $630,000 in each of the years

The Bonds will be dated October 1, 1996 and will bear interest, payable on the first days of April and October in each year until maturity, at the rate per annum specified, in multiples of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1%, by the successful bidder therefor and shall be callable in accordance with the full Notice of Sale. The Bonds will be issued in book-entry form only with one certificate for the aggregate principal amount of the Bonds maturing in each year.
The Bonds will be designated as qualified tax-exempt obligations''for purposes of Section 265(b)(3) of the
Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.

Copies of the full Notice of Sale, the Proposal for Bonds, the Preliminary Official Statement and the form of legal opinion of Hawkins, Delafield & Wood, bond counsel to the Township, may be obtained from Dianne S. Gallets, Township Clerk, Municipal Building, 43 Schooley's Mtn. Road, Long Valley, New Jersey, 07853 (Telephone:908-876-3315).
